Package game.enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Resettable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bowser, Goomba, Koopa, PiranhaPlant
public abstract class Enemy
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
implements Resettable
An entity that is alive by having hit points. It also holds inventory that stores items.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Zoe Low Pei Ee
